about_the_game:
This is a Story about You!

An anti-social Otaku who is a student at Ashikaga Academy, a very traditional private high school in Japan. Suddenly, you awaken in a place called the Spirit Realm and are tasked with saving the world! How? Well, with the help of your fellow classmates and future friends of course! Now all you have to do is join the Horticulture Club and actually meet them!

Make Friends and Improve your Abilities!

You will have to grow close to the six members of the club and help them to create Otaku Miracles, a medicine that helps boost cognitive functions along with some other effects. This can be done by spending time with them and increasing your Culture, Charm and Academics in order to socialize effectively. These skills also correlate to your magical abilities in the Spirit Realm! Participating and succeeding in many activities is the key to increasing your abilities and saving the world!

What Path shall you Walk?

There are many twists and turns and every decision matters! Many different endings are possible depending on the choices you make and who you pursue romantically. Will you save the world? Let the darkness consume you? Pursue love with a special someone? It is entirely up to you!

content_descriptors.notes: Dark and disturbing themes, partial nudity, and violence present through out the game.
